body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Auto Solutions customer service. My name is Ryan Cook. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Megan. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit nervous about my recent car purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand. Can you please provide me with your phone number so we can look into this further?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my number is six five zero, four eight nine, two three one four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Megan. Could you also provide your home address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. My address is one two three, Oak Street, Pleasantville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Megan. Our customer support team will reach out to you shortly to address your concerns.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Megan. Have a great day.
